title: "Heil America" Incorporated (We Didn't Think It Could Happen Here): Volume Two
description: Becca had no way of knowing just how much her life would be changed by the following message she received that Saturday morning when she went on her social network to check out the postings. Not just her life…but her very “You don’t know me, but I work for your Social Network. This morning we had visitors from Homeland Security and they demanded that we turn over to them all information pertaining to your account. They also have access to all your phone contacts as well. This message will be deleted in 20 minutes and all traces of it will disappear. I can only hope you get this message in time. Overhearing the conversations of these men I realize that you are in grave danger. You must leave your home immediately. Go somewhere where they can’t trace you…They are coming to pick you up! May God keep you safe. A Friend.” What she encounters next should be a wake-up call to all of us here in America! What has happened to our country in the last decade? Who is behind it? Why is it being allowed to occur? What can we expect next? Are you in danger? A must read for those who realize that the United States is changing…Fast! Although this book is fictional, it is based on facts. (One could only wish the facts weren’t true!) Facts you need to know, that will astonish, enlighten, and bring into focus the ‘Big Picture’…What is happening here is no longer a nationalistic problem…Its scope is worldwide and your life depends on knowing what that picture is, because it will affect you! Be prepared to be surprised!
author: N.A. Forbush
